turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu yaz güçlü bir sporcu ve disiplinli bir atlet oldun.
english_example_sentence: You became a strong athlete and disciplined sportsperson this summer.
russian_example_sentence: Ты стал сильным спортсменом и дисциплинированным атлетом этим летом.
